간단한 linear regression에 대한 R 코드.

참고자료

- <http://r-statistics.co/Linear-Regression.html>

```{r}
x <- c(30, 20, 60, 80, 40, 50, 60, 30, 70, 60)
y <- c(73, 50, 128, 170, 87, 108, 135, 69, 148, 132)

plot(x, y)
beginr::plotlm(x, y)

r8.lm <- lm(y ~ x)
summary(r8.lm)
confint(r8.lm)

plot(ellipse::ellipse(r8.lm), type="l")
```
